annotations.description: Today we tackle five modern classic Vodka cocktails everyone should know how to make. For today's episode we partnered up with Wheatley Vodka to bring you Fi...
annotations.title: 5 Best Vodka Cocktails Volume 1

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Vodka
.25oz (7.5ml) Cointreau
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup

Shake and strain into Coupe

title: Lemon Drop
